howtoplay.title: How to play
paragraph: 1. Press "Random here" to get a random prompt.

2. The player should summarize the story in a short sentence. For example, if the word is "Snow White" = A short-haired girl who enters a forest, meets seven dwarfs, and accidentally eats a poisoned apple from a witch, causing her to fall unconscious.
3. Press the "Challenge" button to continue building creative ideas
